title: Katena Records: Starting Anew
description:
Inspired by life simulation and classic dungeon-crawling RPGs, this game blends daily life management with deep underground exploration. Each day, plan your character's activities. 
Venture into mysterious multi-layered dungeons filled with monsters and treasures, train to improve your stats and abilities, strategically plan your next moves, or spend time with other characters to deepen relationships and uncover their stories. Your daily choices shape your character's growth, influence your relationships with companions, and determine how the story unfolds both in the dangerous depths below and in the world above ground.
games: Labyrinth of Refrain: Coven of Dusk
